intro.description: This step-by-step guide will lead you through the whole CAS License Handler Refactoring process.

item.title: Choose the license constants class
item.description: In this step the license constant class has to be chosen.

item.title: Add/select license constant to constant class
item.description: In this step you have to assign each variant of a variation point to a license constant.

item.title: Start Refactory
item.description: After every variant was assigned to a constant license the refactory-process can be started.
